document_data.name: Othorion Keove
document_data.Description: Othorion wore full elven mail armor.
document_data.History:
In [[26 DR]], Othorion strongly opposed [[Iliphar Nelnueve]]'s decision to allow [[Faerlthann Obarskyr]] to become the first king of [[Cormyr]].

In [[900 DR]], Othorion was the last survivor of Iliphar's court and returned the court to Cormyr. He claimed that he had come to hunt. His arrival was on the eve of Cormyr's [[Battle with the Witch Lords]] and during the battle, Othorion's elves arrived to aid [[Galaghard III]]'s humans, swinging the battle in their favour and bringing them a victory. Othorion stated that he had felt like hunting [[orc]]s and [[goblin]]s. Othorion gave his approval of the kingdom of Cormyr after the battle.
